all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Listen to the voice of Jesus Christ, your Redeemer, the Great I Am, whose arm of mercy hath atoned for your sins;
Doctrine and Covenants 29:1
Quote of the Day
"We should seize every opportunity to share the teachings of Jesus Christ with children."
Henry B. Eyring | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
